Articles.Content: I've been trying to log in to the bug tracker but it refuses to work. I've made the account fine but when I try to login it tells me to activate my account via email link. Alas, I got no email. I clicked the 'resend email' link but still nothing. Anyone know what to do? Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.
Check your spam folder maybe? The confirmation email should have "Your Squad Bugtracker account activation" as the subject and "[email protected]" as the sender.
@Red Iron Crown I just did a search in gmail for the sender address and the email came up. It seems gmail had the email but wasn't displaying it in any of the folders. All good now thanks.
